name: clamtk
tagline: An easy to use, light-weight, on-demand virus scanner for Linux systems
body:
### Introduction

ClamTk is a graphical front-end for ClamAV using Perl and Gtk libraries. It is designed to be an easy-to-use, lightweight, on-demand antivirus scanner for Linux systems. February 2016 marks our twelfth year!

From this page, you can download Fedora and CentOS rpms as well as Debian and Ubuntu debs. There are builds for older distributions such as Ubuntu 12.04 and CentOS 6. You can also install thunar-sendto-clamtk, nemo-sendto-clamtk, and clamtk-kde if you like to have a right-click, context menu in your file manager.

A build with a new design using Gtk3 is underway.

### Downloads
### ClamTk  (5.21)

Fedora [rpm](https://bitbucket.org/dave_theunsub/clamtk/downloads/clamtk-5.21-1.fc.noarch.rpm), 
CentOS 7 [rpm](https://bitbucket.org/dave_theunsub/clamtk/downloads/clamtk-5.21-1.el7.noarch.rpm), 
CentOS 6 [rpm](https://bitbucket.org/dave_theunsub/clamtk/downloads/clamtk-5.21-1.el6.noarch.rpm), 
Debian/Ubuntu [deb](https://bitbucket.org/dave_theunsub/clamtk/downloads/clamtk_5.21-1_all.deb), 
Older Ubuntu [deb](https://bitbucket.org/dave_theunsub/clamtk-legacy/downloads/clamtk_5.21-1.legacy_all.deb), 
[source](https://bitbucket.org/dave_theunsub/clamtk-legacy/downloads/clamtk-5.21-1.legacy.tar.gz),
Source [tar.gz](https://bitbucket.org/dave_theunsub/clamtk/downloads/clamtk-5.21.tar.gz)

### Authors
Dave M (@dave-theunsub), 2004 - 2016

### Support or Contact
Having trouble?  Have a suggestion?  Email me or, better yet, use this [bug tracker](https://github.com/dave-theunsub/clamtk/issues).
